intro: Polycarpaea densiflora, commonly known as the dense-flowered polycarpaea, is a flowering plant native to parts of Africa. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its compact growth habit and clusters of small, white to pinkish flowers. It typically grows in shaded, moist environments such as forest undergrowth. Its foliage is often used in traditional medicine for its purported health benefits.
